that 應該可以省略左去 ?

姐係what can't do in the classroom?



1. What can't do in the classroom? (Wrong)

2. What we cannot do in the classroom? (Correct)

3. What things we cannot do in the classroom? (also correct but a bit redundant)

4. What we shouldn't do in the classroom? (Better)

Noun(that)noun v 可以唔洗要個that?

你英文拎幾

1星星

1. What can't do in the classroom? (Wrong)

2. What we cannot do in the classroom? (Correct)

3. What things we cannot do in the classroom? (also correct but a bit redundant)

5. What are the things we cannot do in the classroom? (Still grammatically correct, but even more redundant)

4. What we shouldn't do in the classroom? (Better)

What are not allowed to do in class? (Just a suggestion to refine your sentence)

Sentence 1如果del左 we (subject referral) 比較上會冇咁夾硬將中文譯成英文

Sentence 2 加埋things ... 成句會更加clumsy 讀起黎都唔通順


姐係what can't do in the classroom?



1. What can't do in the classroom? (Wrong)

2. What we cannot do in the classroom? (Correct)

3. What things we cannot do in the classroom? (also correct but a bit redundant)

4. What we shouldn't do in the classroom? (Better)
